title: Soy-and-Ginger-Glazed Salmon with Udon Noodles
summary: Soy-and-Ginger-Glazed Salmon with Udon Noodles is a dairy free and pescatarian recipe with 4 servings. One portion of this dish contains approximately 48g of protein, 17g of fat, and a total of 552 calories. For $5.91 per serving, this recipe covers 47% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe is liked by 1 foodies and cooks. A mixture of udon noodles, sesame seeds, spinach, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. It works best as a main course, and is done in roughly 1 hour and 35 minutes. It is brought to you by Food and Wine. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 90%, which is amazing. Users who liked this recipe also liked Salmon With Soy-ginger Noodles, Ginger-Soy Salmon With Soba Noodles, and Soy & ginger salmon with soba noodles.
